text: (upbeat music)

- The approval process we had
for deploying to production

was extremely time consuming,
manual, and opinion based.
It could take literally up to months
to gain approval to deploy,
versus the days it took to develop.

- We built a solution,
completely using AWS services,

mostly serverless options using
ECS Fargate, DynamoDB, S3,
and a variety of other services
so that we can actually go and search
and get information in real time
as to what our security configuration

and security stance was across
all of our AWS accounts.
- We replaced the opinion-based process
with data that we garner from AWS

by all the configuration
data that's available.

We've got data available
we've never had before
and we've normalized that

into helping us document and
understand the risks we have
as we deploy to production.
- Biggest surprise that we actually had

was how easy it was to actually
go and retrieve information
from the various AWS services

that our business partners
were actually deploying
into our accounts.

This allowed us to very
quickly turn around new tests
and new checks, which could then allow us
to more easily allow our business partners
to deploy new solutions to the cloud.
(music concludes)
